summary: This document appears to be a scanned envelope or correspondence cover sheet from the Greene Correctional Facility in Coxsackie, New York, dated May 5, 2021. It contains inmate correspondence program information and mailing details, but the main content is largely garbled or obscured, making substantive analysis impossible.
